attributes.action: All pip and esa assessors made to come to tribunals and be prosecuted
attributes.additional_details: For too long assessors have lied on reports the evidence is overwhelming as more and more are winning at tribunal which shows the assessors are lying they need to be held accountable and prosecuted for fraud as we would if we lied and got benefits because of lying
attributes.background: All assessors of pip and esa that have been accused of lying should be made to come to the tribunal when the person who they assessed takes it there and for all assessors who are found to have lied be prosecuted for fraud

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because decisions about prosecution are made by the Crown Prosecution Service and not the UK Government or Parliament.
